scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a divine vision or heavenly event. At the top, a radiant light emanates from above, surrounded by winged figures, some resembling eagles or griffins, and others more angelic. Below this celestial display, a central figure, possibly an angel, descends or is present, gesturing towards a crowd of people. These individuals are depicted with varied expressions and postures, some with hands clasped in prayer, others looking upwards in awe or supplication. Several figures wear crowns, suggesting royalty or important personages. The overall impression is one of a momentous spiritual occurrence, possibly a divine revelation or judgment.
